Dependencies¶

Night Tools relies heavily on the Scipy ecosystem, as well as command line tools like GDAL, CloudCompare, and LAStools.

Python Standard Library¶

  • os

  • re

  • shutil

  • subprocess

  • multiprocessing

Python packages¶

  • geopandas

  • matplotlib

  • numpy

  • pandas

  • PIL

  • scipy

  • skimage

Other software¶

  • CloudCompare

  • GDAL

  • LAStools

  • PDAL

Night Tools
